amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases the Defense-Wide Research, Development, Test and Evaluation account by $14.364 million with the intent of supporting DOD innovation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 115-785 to reduce and then increases the defense-wide research, development, test and evaluation account by $14.364 million with the intent of supporting DOD innovation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clark (MA) amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 157 (Roll no. 309).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Clark (MA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clark (MA) amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 157 (Roll no. 309).
